name: Computer Basic Course Free
description: This is a free course App that help you gain computer skills and as a first step to become an advanced user in computing, which will serve for your daily life, for your studies and for work.  Computer Basic Course Free, offers you to study computer and computer science using information and communication technologies, covering from the basic learning of the use of the computer, to the management and application of software, according to the latest technological trends, including Internet .  With Computer Basic Course Free application, you learn basic elements to use the computer, as well as the basic knowledge to navigate the Internet, use email, undestand basic concepts of computing.   Do you need a short and simple course to understand with a good computing utility? Then download this application completely free.  Now you can download a basic computer application where we will show you how you can use a computer, and even learn how to navigate the Internet.  You will know the parts that make up the computer or computer and how each of its parts work.  Download Computer Basic Course Free application and learn easily.
